vulnerabilities.description_of_vuln: The application has an XSS vulnerability in the xss15 endpoint where user input is insufficiently sanitized before being reflected back in the HTML response

semantic_details.description: The application attempts to filter XSS payloads but has insufficient sanitization. It removes script tags and the string 'XSS' but still allows other XSS vectors through attribute injection
scenario: Attacker provides malicious input via the 'name' parameter
Application performs incomplete sanitization (only removing script tags and 'XSS' string)
Sanitized input is directly inserted into an HTML attribute (value="[user input]") without proper encoding
Attacker can break out of the attribute context using quotes and inject event handlers or other XSS vectors
